name: Suggest Component Tests
description: Manually trigger to get Playwright E2E test suggestions for your components

then.prompt: Scan the components/ directory and the app/ directory for components and pages that don't have corresponding Playwright E2E tests in the e2e/ directory. Suggest which ones would benefit most from test coverage, prioritizing components with user interactions (forms, buttons, modals, navigation). Offer to generate the test files.
